description:
Welcome to WhatWordWhere, the word find game with a twist—you figure out what words to find (and where, of course.)  

You choose from one of twenty topics.  Within that topic you will be given a puzzle with up to three hint categories.  You find a word, decide which hint category it belongs to, tap the hint and tap any letter in the found word.

You also choose the puzzle size, level of difficulty and other preferences.  If you get stuck, you can ask for a specific word to find.  To accommodate competitive word searchers, a score is given after each completed puzzle based on the puzzle size, number of words you asked for and your time.  

WhatWordWhere contains 20 topics, over 400 hints & over 10,000 words!

Note that if the game doesn’t work at all, the app may have been corrupted during the download.  To resolve such an issue, delete it from the device and re-download it from the app catalog.  

++ v1.1.05 fixes problem we discovered on the Pre2 but the fix makes the app more responsive on other devices as well.
